Title: Requires broadband providers to offer high speed broadband service to certain low-income consumers
Summary: Requires broadband providers to offer high speed broadband service to certain low-income consumers at a cost of not more than five dollars per month.
LawCode: Add ยง399-zzzzzz, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to broadband service for low-income consumers
